title: CANAL / MAN ON WATER LOCK
description: A man is eating salami on the water lock.

links.title: Man on water lock: ""High time I got moving up the coas..."
links.text: "High time I got moving up the coast. But please, officer, after you."

links.title: You: ""But, wait, what's further down the..."
links.text: "But, wait, what's further down the coast?"

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Well, there's the fishing village...."
links.text: "Well, there's the fishing village. An abandoned fish market. A bizarro church. Not much use to the congregation, though -- there always seems to be something wrong with it." He thinks for a moment.

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Yeah, not really much else. Just b..."
links.text: "Yeah, not really much else. Just bombed-out ruins."

links.title: You: ""Alrighty then." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Alrighty then." [Leave.]

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Cheers!" He salutes you with a hal..."
links.text: "Cheers!" He salutes you with a half-eaten piece of salami.

links.title: Man on water lock: ""'Fraid I can't hang out and chat."..."
links.text: "'Fraid I can't hang out and chat." He looks west, across the water, chewing on a piece of salami. "Damned water lock's finally been fixed, so I've got to get going."

links.title: Composure: "He doesn't actually seem to be in a..."
links.text: He doesn't actually seem to be in a rush. It's not in his nature. Enviable calm.

links.title: Man on water lock: ""So, wanna do the honours now?""
links.text: "So, wanna do the honours now?"

links.title: You: ""But what's further down the coast?""
links.text: "But what's further down the coast?"

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Well, there's the fishing village...."
links.text: "Well, there's the fishing village. An abandoned fish market. A bizarro church. Not much use to the congregation, though -- there always seems to be something wrong with it." He thinks for a moment.

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Yeah, not really much else. Just b..."
links.text: "Yeah, not really much else. Just bombed-out ruins."

links.title: You: ""Why don't you just do it yourself?""
links.text: "Why don't you just do it yourself?"

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Bah! I've handled enough heavy mac..."
links.text: "Bah! I've handled enough heavy machinery in my day."

links.title: You: ""I'll get right to it." [Leave.]"
links.text: "I'll get right to it." [Leave.]

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Have you ever made a water lock mo..."
links.text: "Have you ever made a water lock move yourself?" he adds, gesturing toward the water lock control panel to his right. "It's quite the thing. Makes a man feel real powerful."

links.title: You: ""What's with the lever that does no..."
links.text: "What's with the lever that does nothing?" (Point at the control panel next to him.)

links.title: Man on water lock: ""It's supposed to operate the water..."
links.text: "It's supposed to operate the water lock, but as noted... it's all junk right now. Disabled because of the blockage."

links.title: You: ""Why is it disabled?""
links.text: "Why is it disabled?"

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Safety measure. Turns out the pane..."
links.text: "Safety measure. Turns out the panel needs a special key to be re-activated. Wouldn't want anyone moving the water lock with debris still in the channel."

links.title: Man on water lock: ""It'll be restarted on Wednesday mo..."
links.text: "It'll be restarted on Wednesday morning." He nods his head towards the control panel. "You wanna do the honours when the time comes?"

links.title: You: ""Do I ever!" (Nod enthusiastically...."
links.text: "Do I ever!" (Nod enthusiastically.)

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Great! Just drop in on Wednesday i..."
links.text: "Great! Just drop in on Wednesday if you want to see the water lock at work. They say the canal crew will be here at 07.15." He cuts a fresh slice from his salami.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "The coast part of the map is inacce..."
links.text: The coast part of the map is inaccessible until the third day.

links.title: You: ""We'll see... I'm not all that into..."
links.text: "We'll see... I'm not all that into manual labour."

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Suit yourself. Just drop by on Wed..."
links.text: "Suit yourself. Just drop by on Wednesday if you want to see the water lock work again." He cuts a fresh slice from his salami.

links.title: You: ""You said the coast is closed off?..."
links.text: "You said the coast is closed off? This may be why Lena's husband Morell the cryptozoologist hasn't returned."

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Uhm... I haven't seen any *cryptol..."
links.text: "Uhm... I haven't seen any *cryptologists* around here, but sure -- if they're on the other side, they're stuck. Like my friend Barry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should probably go tell Lena. T..."
links.text: "We should probably go tell Lena. Take a load off her mind."

links.title: Logic: "You should probably tell Lena. It'l..."
links.text: You should probably tell Lena. It'll take a load off her mind.

links.title: You: ""Do you know what's further down th..."
links.text: "Do you know what's further down the coast?"

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Well, there's the fishing village...."
links.text: "Well, there's the fishing village. An abandoned fish market. A bizarro church. Not much use to the congregation, though -- there always seems to be something wrong with it." He thinks for a moment.

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Yeah, not really much else. Just b..."
links.text: "Yeah, not really much else. Just bombed-out ruins."

links.title: You: ""Can I have some of that salami?" (..."
links.text: "Can I have some of that salami?" (Point at his food.)

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Sure thing." He cuts off a slice o..."
links.text: "Sure thing." He cuts off a slice of salami.

links.title: Perception (Taste): "It is salty. It is savoury. It is c..."
links.text: It is salty. It is savoury. It is chewy. The hangover only makes the salami *more* tasty.

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Want some too, officer?" he turns..."
links.text: "Want some too, officer?" he turns to the lieutenant.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not?" The lieutenant ponders t..."
links.text: "Why not?" The lieutenant ponders the offer for a moment, then decides to go for it. He takes a slice of salami from the man and chews on it.

links.title: You: ""Right, bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Right, bye." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Man on water lock: ""G'day to you, officer!""
Man on water lock: ""Good morning to you, officer!""
Man on water lock: ""Welcome back, officer.""

links.title: You: ""First things first -- what are you..."
links.text: "First things first -- what are you doing here, man on the water lock?"

links.title: Man on water lock: ""My friend Barry the Butcher is stu..."
links.text: "My friend Barry the Butcher is stuck on the other side of the water lock. I'm keeping him company -- and eating his salami."

links.title: Barry the Butcher: "From the corner of your eye you see..."
links.text: From the corner of your eye you see a man in a yellow shirt and grey overalls waving at you from across the canal. He seems disappointed about the wreckage on the water lock -- *and* the salami.

links.title: Man on water lock: ""*Very* good stuff. Anything I can..."
links.text: "*Very* good stuff. Anything I can do for you, officer?" The man on the water lock picks the skin off a slice of a salami and takes a sizeable bite.

links.title: You: ""Do you know what caused this wreck..."
links.text: "Do you know what caused this wreckage?" (Point at the smashed billboard in the canal.)

links.title: Man on water lock: ""I wasn't here to witness it, but t..."
links.text: "I wasn't here to witness it, but those look like tyre tracks on that sign. Weird, huh? Then again, plenty of daredevil drivers in Revachol."

links.title: Inland Empire: "The words *daredevil driver* sound..."
links.text: The words *daredevil driver* sound ominous to you.

links.title: Man on water lock: ""Too bad it also takes a year and a..."
links.text: "Too bad it also takes a year and a day to repair anything 'round here -- especially a water lock. The rest of the coast is closed off till then."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "This is the water lock on the Marti..."
links.text: This is the water lock on the Martinaise Canal. It has to be the same water lock Lena mentioned, the one her husband crossed on his "expedition."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Man on water lock: "A burly man hangs out by the water..."
links.text: A burly man hangs out by the water lock, carving up a generous serving of salami with an old hunter's knife. His eyes are fixed on a man stranded on the other side of the water lock -- and on an enormous billboard that has fallen down into the canal between them.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "His posture is relaxed. Despite his..."
links.text: His posture is relaxed. Despite his powerful build and the knife in his hand, this man resorts to physical intimidation only infrequently, if at all.

dialogueTree.title: Man on water lock: ""G'day to you, officer!""
Man on water lock: ""Good morning to you, officer!""
